Class TaskRunner.ConsolePrinter

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.TaskRunner.ConsolePrinter
  • Enclosing class:
    TaskRunner

    public final class TaskRunner.ConsolePrinter
extends java.lang.Object
    The printing of output to the console

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void print(java.lang.String text)
      Prints the specified text without appending a line separator
      void printBr(java.lang.String text)
      Prints a message which is formatted such that it begins with two closing angle brackets and ends with the line separator.
      void printLine(java.lang.String text)
      Prints the specified text with a line separator at the end

        public void printLine(java.lang.String text)

      • printBr

        public void printBr(java.lang.String text)
        Prints a message which is formatted such that it begins with two closing angle brackets and ends with the line separator. This output is intended for predefined status/error messages.
        Parameters:
        text - the text
